title: Cant play the game cause of bug
body: Cant play game when someone doesnt ban it makes me wait a while and then everyone leaves lobby gets kicked out im guessing except me then after 5 miniutes i just leave cause its just at ban screen still i did this 2 times and now have a 30 miniute timer wow this freaking sucks what do i do wait 4 hours in champ select for the game to not work

replies.body: It almost sounds like the ban isn't going through for you, so then the client thinks you're afk and it kicks you out. That can happen sometimes if your network isn't able to reliably send that ban to our servers. We should be able to get that fixed right up by updating some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), but hit me back if that doesn't do the trick!

I didnt update network setting cause before you posted this the bug ended BUT now i have a new bug that whenever i go into ready check it declines my match and says an unexpected error occured loading ready check
